snippet.title: The Talos Principle 2 | Reveal Trailer | Coming 2023
snippet.description:
Coming to PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S in 2023, The Talos Principle 2 greatly expands on the beloved original with more mind-bending puzzles to solve, new puzzle mechanics, a richer storyline, more secrets to uncover, and the biggest, weirdest world Croteam has ever built.

Visit http://thetalosprinciple.com for more information.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Steam ➟ https://store.steampowered.com/app/835960/The_Talos_Principle_2/
Epic Game Store ➟ https://store.epicgames.com/p/the-talos-principle-2-ab1034
